evidence.claim: WorkDone utilizes AWS services such as Lambda and S3 for its cloud infrastructure.
The company's platform adheres to HIPAA regulations for data security and patient privacy.
WorkDone implements FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
EDI capabilities including X12 transaction sets are featured in their service offerings.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 EDI transactions and HIPAA compliance; fits target size and tech stack for healthcare data exchange.
